alert.note: Alert for Jackson Hole; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 1:27PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Teton County through 200 PM MDT... At 127 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Victor, or near Driggs, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Alta around 135 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Rendezvous Peak, Teton Village, Moose, Phelps Lake and Grand Teton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Riverton.

area.areaDesc: Jackson Hole; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains
